medical_history.chief_complaint: Gradually worsening headaches, vague upper abdominal pain, and lower back pain.

medical_history.past_medical_history: Gastro-esophageal reflux disease and type II diabetes.
medical_history.social_history: Denied smoking, alcohol or drug use, occupational exposure, and international travel.
